title: In game for 210 minutes?
body: Is it just me that sees this or is this more common? For me, its been around for a long time, will riot ever fix??

replies.body: When i hover the names of the people on my friends lists, it says they have been in game for like 500 minutes so i cannot tell if they just started or maybe they are going to finish soon. I was just wondering if it was more common and whether riot knew about it. I should have made it more clear sorry.
